title: Coleman Institute Current Gift Fund
description: To support the Coleman Institute for Cognitive Disabilities.
marketingContent: The Coleman Institute for Cognitive Disabilities at the University of Colorado works to catalyze and integrate advances in technology that promote the quality of life for people with cognitive disabilities and their families. Cognitive disabilities includes intellectual and developmental disabilities (IDD); Alzheimerâ€™s; stroke; brain injury; and serious and persistent mental illness.
